title: The Critical Role of Clean, Accurate, and Valuable Data in Leveraging Business-focused Generative AI
description: With the major strides that technology has been making, AI or artificial intelligence has arguably emerged as one of the most transformative technologies in this decade. Specifically, generative AI is earning the spotlight in various sectors, particularly in business. This AI model leverages machine learning, enabling computer systems to mimic human actions, generate new data, and offer predictive analytics.
